title: Incorrect time
body: For a while now, I have had an issue where the timer that shows how long an ally has been in a game is incredibly off. I believe it starts at 50 minutes or something, and while not a huge inconvenience, is still irritating. Does anybody know how to fix this?

replies.body: This can happen if your OS clock is wrong! [ Syncing your clock](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761944-Login-Issues#wq3) should fix this!   Let me know if you run into any issues with that, though.
